conbody.p: Enter a bibliographical information using the Thesaurus here. The tab contains:

ul.li: Bibliographical text field: A field where you can enter the bibliographical data manually. Currently it is recommended to use this field only.

Bibliographical entry / Bib. item: Navigate through Thesaurus with Search to find the correct bibliographical reference. The bibliographical thesaurus was not ready yet at the time of the compilation of this manual. We recommend to use "Bibliographical text field" instead.
Bibliographical entry / plates: Enter the plate number and/or select the check box with a letter below.
Comment: Use this input field to comment your reference.
Add Entry Group: Click to add an additional bibliography section.
Remove Entry Group: Click to delete a bibliography section.
